Reviews.Title: This tvl/bundle is a great deal
Reviews.Author: steve mendez
Reviews.Content: so far so good!Had this TV for about a month now. I havn't had any problems with it. Everything works fine.Apps work, internet works, the clarity is great! i do recommend this tvl/bundle.

ProductInfo.Features:
UN40F6300 40 inch 120hz 1080p Smart WiFi Slim LED HDTV
Flat Adjustable Wall Bracket w/ tilt & level TVs 32-60 inches
Home/Office Surge Protector Power Kit (270 joules protection)
2 6 ft High Speed 3D Ready 120hz Ready 1080p HDMI Cables
Performance TV/LCD Screen Cleaning Kit
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung UN40F6300 40" 120hz 1080p WiFi LED Slim Smart HDTV Wall Mount Bundle - Includes HDTV, Adjustable TV Wall Mount, Surge Protector Power Kit (270 joules protection), 2 6 ft High Speed 3D Ready 120hz Ready 1080p HDMI Cables, and TV Screen Cleaning Kit
